alert.note: Alert for Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 01 at 1:15PM PDT until September 02 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 50 mph expected. Strongest winds in the eastern San Gabriels and adjacent foothills. * WHERE...Antelope Valley Foothills, San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
